name: Chicken Parm Sandwiches
description: Turn your kitchen into a little Italian haven while redefining your sandwich game. Italian Meatball Seasoning cleverly doubles as a gluten-free breading with all the classic flavours of Italian herbs. We like our sammies spread with a little Roasted Garlic Aioli.
preparation: Preheat oven to 425° F. Place two Cooling Racks on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner. Lightly brush racks with oil to prevent sticking.

To thinly slice chicken, place one hand on one breast and press down firmly. Curve fingers up slightly for safety. Carefully slice meat horizontally. Repeat with remaining chicken. You should have eight pieces in total.
In a bowl, toss chicken with mayo.
Place seasoning in a shallow dish. Using tongs or your hands, add chicken one piece at a time, rotating and pressing to coat with seasoning.
Place chicken on racks, leaving some space between each piece. Bake 15 min.
Remove pan from oven and top each chicken with 1⁄4 cup sauce and 1 tbsp cheese. Bake for an additional 5 min, or until chicken is cooked.
Split and toast buns, if desired. Divide arugula between bottom halves of split buns; top each with a piece of chicken and cover with top bun.
tips: If following the Epic Life program, prepare Marinara Sauce with low-sodium, crushed and diced tomatoes.
Swap 2 pkgs Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix for Italian Meatball Seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.

products.name: Crispy & Crunchy Coating (Pkg of 3)
summary: Craving the crunch? Add a crispy gluten free coating – that’s never soggy or bland – to protein and veggies and bake them in the oven. You’ll get all the taste of your fave fried foods without a trace of greasiness, so you can enjoy them whenever the craving strikes!

products.name: Italian Meatball Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: You’ve gotta love a juicy meatball! Our gluten free blends makes perfectly shaped, moist meatballs that are the perfect partners for spaghetti and marinara sauce, stuffed into sandwiches, smashed onto pizza, or added to soup. Make a big batch and freeze them to use whenever your meatball craving strikes!

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favourite.
